name: Desert: A Future
description:
A short story/adventure game about a possible near future.

Industrial civilization has pushed the Earth into a new, hotter, ecological stable-state. The planet lives on, but human society is reduced to a binary between desert slums and wars over oil.

You escaped, but to survive you need friends. Like Galya on the radio.

Web performance can be poor, so download if you're having issues.

Credits:
  • 'Ozymandias' poem by Percy Bysshe Shelley
  • Galya's voice by Elizabeth Baker
  • Palette by polyphrog
  • 'magero' font by code807
  • Some sounds from freesound.org (check in-game credits)
  • Everything else by Liam Scaife.
